about_the_game:
This is Paradise Island, where the visitors wildest dream comes true and on this beach resort where your adventure begins.

Unfortunately, as your budget is nearly gone just for coming here, you need some ways to flirt using your measly brain to get laid.

And fortunately, the kind twins catbunny girls guides are very kind to help you in your endeavor, for some benefits of course.

Now enjoy the island to your best and let's make the best of your summer memories!

Gameplay

This is an adventure game where you need to explore and meet various girls and getting the items they need or maybe some task they given to have a nice night with the girls.

  • Re-fund yourself by doing lots of miscellaneous task from the island residents.  Any pennies will help filling war funds, as nothing is come free.

  • Interact with the girls to seduce and getting intimate with them.

  • Search and gather every items in the island for a hefty rewards waiting.

  • Solve puzzles to unlock more rewards.

  • Build your harem and make it worth your time.

Contents

  • 4 Heroines to conquer.

  • 2 animations each

  • and some bonus CGs you can get for an effort.

  • also a secrets you might need to break your bone to get em.

content_descriptors.notes:
Be warned, this game contains a lot of sexy sluts in cliche situations.
Rich girl ringlets, tomboy sporty gal, manic fisherwoman, and of course catgirls included inside.
Raise their affection and you can "Frank"ly having some hot adventure together.

name: Monmusu Paradise ~Visitors~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated some cases, this game will not launch unless the sound utility "Nahimic" is stopped.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated some cases, this game will not launch unless the sound utility "Nahimic" is stopped.

short_description: Welcome to Monmusu Paradise Island, Where your lewdest memories come true! Start your adventure by exploring the island and getting items and money needed for you to get laid successfully with various girls on the island.
